item.title: 2018 04 17 LLVM
item.description: Efficiently Compiling Efficient Query Plans for Modern Hardware Buzzwords tuple at a time Volcano iterator model MonetDB VectorWise, Peloton operation at a time vector at a time Transpilation Gcc compilation time may be long JIT Compilatioon push-based data-centric keep tuple in CPU register LLVM toolkit intermediate representation(IR) HyPer\’s Adaptive Execution model Summary For the in-memory DBMS, the CPU becomes the bottlenecks of CPU.
